https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fcFBOC4cTAPtoQLaSrDsknotMcQ.jpg Troubled teens in a 2nd chance 'bootcamp' program encounter a group of terrorists trying to take out a rural nuclear power plant. Stuck in remote area with no skills or communication to the outside world, the teens find they are the only thing that can stop a nuclear threat. Bad Company
